message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $140 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $130?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we try $125?
